metadata.synopsis: Buyer1, a halfling, Pheebs Splayfoot. Steeps calculation: multiple buyers negotiate with a merchant on the price of their goods. The merchant is pretty much fleecing them, but they'll make a killing re-selling the explosive materials once the fight starts proper, and they know it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -212; 11; --187- Talk to the Halfling buyer

0.speaker: Pheebs Splayfoot
0.text: Brandobaris curse me, I should have taken that deal the first time it was offered at half today's price. I'm a sap.

1.speaker: Pheebs Splayfoot
1.text: Believe me, saer, I'm not a price gouger, but it's the market that sets the goods' value.

2.speaker: Pheebs Splayfoot
2.text: Uh-oh, I heard about you. Please, I'm not carrying any real gold on me, so there's no reason to shake me down - you can just leave me alone. All right?
